document_data.name: Ossium
document_data.mainbody: '''Ossium''' was an elder [[spirit naga]] that dwelled in [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The naga lurked in the [[Myth Drannor/Cormanthor|Cormanthor]] ward of the city near the [[House of Gems]].
